name: Distortionist Battle! (V1.2)
description:
This is a fan - made battle i did in about 2 days, soooo dont come in with high expectations lol

Controls -

Use the arrow keys to move. Click the screen before trying to move.

Use the Z key to attack

Updates -

- Fixed the "Virus" attack lagging (8/5/18)

- Finished the game. (7/31/18)

- Added new attacks (7/31/18)

- Added Dialogue (7/31/18)

- Added New Music (7/31/18)

- Added the ability to attack the enemy (7/31/18)

- Added the beginning of phase 2
